name: Extra Jam 2015 Game!
description:
Extra Jam! 2015
Theme: "Modern weapons with a magical twist"

Requires 3 Xbox 360/One or PS3/4 controllers.

Player 1: Assault rifle that fires magic bullets.
Player 2: Health launcher that fires health vials which explode healing friends and harming foes.
Player 3: Shield launcher that summons shields which slow down and weaken the enemy. A maximum of 2 shields can be summoned at a time. Extra shield orbs will explode doing damage to enemies.

"It's porktastic!" -Adam

"I WIN!" -Annabelle

"I'm too tired to give you a quote..." -Brad

"Don't stay out too late!" -Trude
